title: DIN in Hebrew?
content:
Hi all!

Im working in a project that uses FF DIN Pro in their identity logo lockup. They are going international and looking to translate their name onto different languages (Hebrew included). I can't find an Hebrew version of FF DIN Pro (or any other DIN). Im facing with the decision of finding an alternate typeface that could accommodate my needs. Please send help!
author: danielguillermo

comments.content:
Hi Daniel!

I designed a Hebrew type called "Danidin" which was inspired by Din. (but was not designed to be a Hebrew Din version). I'll let you be the judge about the match

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/din_5261.png)
  
 and you can try the font at my site: [hafontia.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104304/http:/hafontia.com/)

Cheers !
